text: Truly Madly Guilty is a novel by Australian author Liane Moriarty. It tells the story of Sam and Clementine, an ordinary yet busy married couple trying to balance work and family life. After the couple is invited by Clementine's old friend Erika to a neighbor's barbecue party, a spiral of intrigue, lust, and betrayal is unleashed. The book was published in July 2016 by Flatiron Books. Just weeks after the novel's release, it was announced that Reese Witherspoon and Nicole Kidman had optioned for the novel's film rights. At the time, Witherspoon and Kidman had already begun producing a television miniseries adaptation of Moriarty's previous novel, Big Little Lies. ==Awards== * 2016: Goodreads Choice Awards, Best Fiction ==References== Category:2016 Australian novels
